# add(_:)

**Instance Method**

Inserts a given object at the end of the array.

## Declaration

```swift
func add(_ anObject: Any)
```

## Parameters

- **anObject**: The object to add to the end of the array’s content. This value must not be `nil`.



## Related Documentation

- **remove(_:)**: Removes all occurrences in the array of a given object.
- **setArray(_:)**: Sets the receiving array’s elements to those in another given array.

## Adding Objects

- **addObjects(from:)**: Adds the objects contained in another given array to the end of the receiving array’s content.
- **insert(_:at:)**: Inserts a given object into the array’s contents at a given index.
- **insert(_:at:)**: Inserts the objects in the provided array into the receiving array at the specified indexes.
